plot outline: A struggling filmmaker Chandran, gets a Producer for his film. The producer who runs a Fishing export business by the shores of North Madras has one condition though - the film should star his daughter Maha as the female lead. Her gorgeous looks convince Chandran & his team initially to proceed with scripting. But only later do they realize their folly.
title: Uppu Karuvaadu
plot: A struggling filmmaker Chandran, gets a Producer for his film.
